title: Monrjiall.Head.headAgain
body:
Why are you only a head? Where is the rest of your body?

[[Mimir.Head.sadStory]]

title: Mimir.Head.sadStory
body:
Ah, that is a sad story, indeed. 
Would you like to hear it?

[[Monrjiall.Head.long]]

title: Monrjiall.Head.long
body:
Is it long?

[[Mimir.Head.long]]

title: Mimir.Head.long
body:
Oh, yes, very. Long and full of sorrow and betrayal.

[[Monrjiall.Head.no]]

title: Monrjiall.Head.no
body:
Oh… no, then, I would not like to hear it.

[[Mimir.Head.short]]

title: Mimir.Head.short
body:
I’ll give you the short version then. 
I was a guest to the Vanir gods once. 
However, their mistrust led them to try and kill me. 
They beheaded me and sent my head back to Odin. 
Odin valued my wisdom and advice too much to let me die... 
So he used magic to keep my head alive.
Now I spent my days at his side, a faithful advisor in the best of times...
A quaint nightstand ornament in the worst ones.

[[Monrjiall.Head.longIndeed]]

title: Monrjiall.Head.odinMimir
body:
<<if not visited ("Mimir.Head.sometimes")>>
[[Do you give fashion advice to Odin?|Mimir.Head.sometimes]]
<<endif>>
<<if not visited ("Mimir.Head.mission")>>
[[If Odin values you so much, how come you are here in Midgard, half-buried in snow and surrounded by dead bodies?|Mimir.Head.mission]]
<<endif>>
[[If you are so wise, maybe you can help me on my quest|Mimir.Puzzles.god]]

title: Mimir.Head.sometimes
body:
Sometimes, yes. 
He’s rather self-conscious about his looks.

[[Monrjiall.Head.fashion]]

title: Monrjiall.Head.fashion
body:
Would you give me advice on what to wear?

[[Mimir.Head.horns]]

title: Mimir.Head.horns
body:
You can start by removing those horns from your head. 
Who wears that?

[[Monrjiall.Head.odinMimir]]

title: Mimir.Head.mission
body:
Umm, yes… don’t tell anyone... 
But he sent me on a secret mission.

[[Monrjiall.Head.wow]]

title: Monrjiall.Head.wow
body:
Wow! Really?? 
What is it?

[[Mimir.Head.goodQuestion]]

title: Mimir.Head.goodQuestion
body:
Yes, what is it, good question...
Unfortunately, I cannot tell you.
It's top secret.

[[Monrjiall.Head.ofCourse]]

title: Monrjiall.Head.legs
body:
Right. Right. 
And how do you complete this mission without any legs? 
Or arms? 
Or body at all?

[[Mimir.Head.confess]]

title: Mimir.Head.suppose
body:
I can't tell you that, either, I suppose.

[[Monrjiall.Head.legs]]

title: Monrjiall.Head.ofCourse
body:
Of course. 
But where do you have to go for this mission?

[[Mimir.Head.suppose]]

title: Mimir.Head.confess
body:
Alright, fine! You caught me! 
Odin gets drunk from time to time and likes throwing me around. 
Sometimes it gets out of hand and I end up being hurled through Yggdrasil to other worlds. 
That’s how I ended up here, in this particular occasion.

[[Monrjiall.Head.understand]]

title: Monrjiall.Head.understand
body:
I still don’t understand how you are going to complete the mission.

[[Mimir.Head.wow]]

title: Mimir.Head.wow
body:
Wow… just.. wow...

[[Monrjiall.Head.odinMimir]]

title: Monrjiall.Head.longIndeed
body:
That was rather long for a short version.

[[Monrjiall.Head.odinMimir]]
